AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Prostitute
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] worked the streets of the Ni'Hal Empire and provided comfort for the soldiers abroad.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Soldier
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is a soldier for the Nihal Empire.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Conscript
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was conscripted to fight in one of the many wars for te Empire.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Navy cook
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] serves as a chef in the Ni'Hal navy.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Medic
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] serves as a medic in the Ni'Hal army. Medical care is typically reserved for military personel in Ni'Hal society.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Frontline soldier
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] serves as a frontline soldier, a position of great honor to the Ni'Hal.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Breeder
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] worked to increase the population of the Ni'Hal Empire. A necessary duty, considering their casualty rates.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Weaponsmith
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a designer of weapons of war, and [PAWN_pronoun], along with others of [PAWN_possessive] design team, made and improved weapons that have killed many, many people. [PAWN_pronoun] was proud of his work, knowing that it would help kill many xenos.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Construction worker
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] enjoyed [PAWN_possessive] work, building large structures both in space, and on solid ground. While [PAWN_pronoun] didn't plan the building themselves, [PAWN_pronoun] took pride in [PAWN_possessive] work.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Colonizer
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: One of the brave souls who headed out for new worlds. [PAWN_nameDef] was responsible for making settlements and environments as similar to that of Rax'Thalaki as possible.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Agent
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was one of a few esteemed members of a Secret Service, preforming the Emperor's will with lethal efficientcy.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Prideful xenophobe
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] never liked other species, more than most. [PAWN_pronoun] often bragged about the past purges [PAWN_pronoun] enacted, either directly, or by giving the order.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Bodybuilder
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a bastion of strength on [PAWN_possessive] home planet, following a strict cycle in order to be very powerful looking. As a result, [PAWN_pronoun] was drafted into posing for propoganda. [PAWN_pronoun] loved to show off [PAWN_possessive] figure to the masses

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Guard
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] used to be a soldier, patrolling the walls of a P.O.W. camp, happily gunning down prisoners who tried to escape without mercy, till one day [PAWN_pronoun] shot a prisoner who was needed alive. Even with no fault of [PAWN_possessive] own, an example needed to be made, and thus [PAWN_possessive] rations were cut short for a month.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Miner
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: One of many, [PAWN_nameDef] worked the mines, digging up material to be used in any number of numerous war efforts. [PAWN_pronoun] preformed about as well as others in [PAWN_possessive] job.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Re-educated
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was considered 'misguided' since [PAWN_pronoun] wanted to have peace with other races, seeking to have unity. [PAWN_pronoun] was sent to a re-education center to be set on the "correct path." It didn't stick, but [PAWN_pronoun] pretended to go along with it to avoid punishment.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Advisor
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was an advisor to one of the dictators who have ruled the Ni'Hal Conglomerate. [PAWN_pronoun] served well, and lived without a want in the world.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Purifier
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] took pleasure in [PAWN_possessive] work purging the filthy xenos. [PAWN_pronoun] ordered [PAWN_pronoun] men to kill without remorse or second thought.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Teacher
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was an effective teacher, working diligently to instill loyalty to the Emperor into many children, along side other basic learning required for being a useful worker.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Officer
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] lead squads of soldiers in combat.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Gene warrior
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is a genetically engineered supersoldier.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Model student
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a model child, who sung praises to the Emperor every morning, reported any crimes, and studied hard.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Rebellious child
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a problem child, stealing books slated to be burned, and reading them, sneaking them onto library shelves, and even writing forbidden messages on walls. They were good at not getting caught.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Spacer
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was born on a space ship and spent most of their childhood on one ship or another. The close quarters meant that [PAWN_pronoun] had to be friendly with [PAWN_possessive] neighbors and had to know how to maintain the ship [PAWN_pronoun] was on.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Colonizer
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up in a fledgling colony. They had to help the community grow and thrive.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Killer
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a vicious child, killing small animals by the dozens every day. As [PAWN_pronoun] grew bigger, so did the things [PAWN_pronoun] killed. [PAWN_possessive] elders praised [PAWN_possessive] zeal.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Orphan
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] thought [PAWN_pronoun] had been orphaned when [PAWN_possessive] parents had been taken from [PAWN_objective] at a young age. [PAWN_pronoun] still hasn't heard from them. They had to learn to fend for themselves.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Stargazer
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: The stars always fascinated [PAWN_nameDef], and knowing that one day [PAWN_pronoun] could go out amongst them drove [PAWN_objective] through [PAWN_possessive] education at a very directed pace.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Bully
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] frequently bullied other children if they appeared even slightly different then the others, taking pride in being one of the many.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Groomed child
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was in the family of someone important, having private schooling, medical care, and grooming to be a replacement for [PAWN_possessive] parent when the time came.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Brainwashed
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was caught with a banned book as a child, and was 're-educated' by the Ministry of Benevolence.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Designer baby
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was genetically engineered to be a perfect child.
